Campus × WINK! × SING × Experience — Basic to Ultimate Baller V, plus custom mission specializations

pricing_summary.upfront_one_time: Base Model ~$20,000; Members Only $75,000; Ultimate VIP $200,000 (base model latest Ferrari); Full Ultimate Baller V full options $500,000 (top loaded Ferrari — top base). Other products: see plan (campus, WINK!, Space Cloud full cosmic tier, Sun Spots, Schumann, SING! node EGS, ad space, etc.).
pricing_summary.monthly: Golden Fractal Key access fees (Base Model and where applicable) — contact for current monthly key fee. Campus Monthly Pass (Baller) $50k/month. Premium sponsor tiers where applicable.
pricing_summary.usage: Session/slot-based where applicable: Sun Spots (8/16/24 min), Schumann iGaming ($499/session), SING! node EGS (1 day/week/month), Space Cloud plans (book), ad space (book slot), campus half-day/overnight/weekly, WINK!, dispensary. Never bought, always booked.
